basics.name: Krzysztof Seelig
basics.label: Software
basics.summary: I have been a it professionally since 2004. I have a degree in systems engineering and a masters in it. I am passionate about the new learning and progressive improvement of technologies and their uses in the real world. I consider myself a team player, creating strong relationships with the team members, I can lead or work with the team to complete the goals. Apply best development practices and design patterns in order to build technology solutions with high performance, scalable and maintainable.

references.reference: I worked with Krzysztof while at play and it was an absolute pleasure. Krzysztof designed and developed the backend of play. From the perspective of a qa engineer, he was a dream to work with as he always cared for the quality of the product and ensured any fixes in a timely manner. He comes up with all the edge cases during product discussion and gave innovative ideas to improve the value of the product. Krzysztof has been a team player, always willing to listen to and build on others recommendation as well as help others debug when they run into issues.
references.name: Adam Chun
